terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks
Class ThirdBlocks

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks.ThirdBlocks
public class ThirdBlocks
extends java.lang.Object

These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "third person manipulation".

Because these building blocks are rather specific in purpose they are included here as utilities instead of as general purpose building block classes in the framework core.

Nested Class Summary
static class ThirdBlocks.BaseControl
          Constructs a base control with feedback and actuation input and output allowing it to be used as both a drag control source and as a control indicator target.
static class ThirdBlocks.LiftControl
          Constructs a third person "lift" control.
static class ThirdBlocks.RotateControl
          Constructs a third person "rotate" control.

buildMultiMark

public static final MultiShape buildMultiMark(boolean pickable,
                                              double rectW,
                                              double rectH)
Creates a MultiShape control "mark" for a third person control.

Parameters:
pickable - If true the mark will be pickable.
rectW - Width of the mark rectangle.
rectH - Height of the mark rectangle.
Returns:
New MultiShape object containing the mark.

buildControlSound

public static final MultiShape buildControlSound(AppView view)
Creates a set of sound effects for a third person control.

Parameters:

Returns:
New MultiShape object containing the decoration.

connectRotateControl

public static final ActuationSplitter connectRotateControl(ThirdBlocks.RotateControl control,
                                                           SecondBlocks.FloorTarget target)
Interconnects the actuation of a rotate control with that of a floor target. The control is connected such that the target is only affected when it is double-selected for rotation and the mouse is over the control.

Parameters:
control - Rotate control. Never null.
target - Floor target. Never null.
Returns:
Actuation splitter connected to the target and used as an enabler.

connectLiftControl

public static final ActuationSplitter connectLiftControl(ThirdBlocks.LiftControl control,
                                                         SecondBlocks.FloorTarget target)
Interconnects the actuation of a lift control with that of a floor target. The control is connected such that the target is only affected when it is triple-selected for lift and the mouse is over the control.

Parameters:
control - Lift control. Never null.
target - Floor target. Never null.
Returns:
Actuation splitter connected to the target and used as an enabler.
